body.description: A 2-in-1 hard surface sweeping and mopping tool. The dry sweeping cloth has deep ridges and grooves that conform to the surface of your floor to trap and lock dirt, dust and hair, while the wet mopping pad dissolves dirt and grime and traps it away giving you an amazing clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good product that I use to clean my tiled floors. As a 80 something year old person , it is easy to use and does a good job sweeping and mopping the floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Convenient But Upgrade to Reusable Pads
reviews.reviewText: If you haven’t heard of the Swiffer you’ve probably been living under a rock. That said I had never owned one until now. We recently swapped out our carpet floors for bamboo so we needed something easy to clean it with that wouldn’t take up a ton of closet space. I guess all the commercials worked because I gravitated towards this mop.It shipped quickly, was easy to assemble (didn’t need the instructions), and it’s easy to maneuver around. The handle doesn’t extend or anything but I’m ok with that. Also it comes with a few disposable dry pads and a few wet pads. I’ve given both of them a try and I think the dry pads have more use in day to day life but honestly the pads are the weakest point of the mop. Super convenient but not the best at actually cleaning.Also maybe it's just my sensitive nose talking but I found the wet ones to be really strong fragrance-wise. They worked well, but the smell just seemed to linger and I wasn’t really a fan of that. It seemed to dry fast though.That said I quickly realized how expensive these pads are to replace, especially if you use 5-6 pads during your weekly cleaning session like I do.So instead of buying another pack of refills, I ended up buying a set of reusable microfiber mop pads that I can wash and reuse from Amazon. If you search reusable swiffer pads on Amazon you can likely find them, they are the green multi-surface ones with the white straps on the backside.Anyways, they work great with the swiffer. The size matches and you can put it on easily with the velcro. The only thing is that they’re not pre-wet (since well, they’re more of a cloth) so you have to use it with a separate bottle of cleaner. I just ended up using white vinegar and water, spray the whole rooms floor in like 30 seconds and then get down to business.I will say, however, that the swiffer is not designed for heavy scrubbing. I mean, you could probably do it but honestly for spots that need that kind of cleaning, I just go on my knees with a regular cloth.A list of pros and cons:(+)- The swiffer is compact and very lightweight- Easy to set up, you can start using it within minutes- Doesn’t take up much space in the storage closet- The mop is really cheap so I’m not worried if one of the kids breaks it- It comes with all the stuff you need to use it right away(-)- The handle is kind of flimsy and not extendable so you might have to bend down- Refill pads are kind of expensive but you probably already know that- The mop head isn’t very big so it might not be best for larger areas- Wet pads have a very strong fragrance that lingers after cleaningOverall…I am still pleased with the purchase. It's not perfect but then again I didn’t expect it to be anyway when I bought it. For under $20 (not including the refills that you have to get), it does the job well and I’m satisfied with the results. Plus with how light weight the mop is basically anyone of any age can use it. If you’ve got kids or elderly parents in the home this is probably one of the better options out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for pet owners
reviews.reviewText: This is a must. Quick n easy. Picks up alot of dog hair. Cleans great..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for RV use
reviews.reviewText: We got one of these for our RV, which is ideal because it folds down small. We found that the heavy duty mopping pads smell so good and clean the floors well.The negative is that 2 pads to clean our 24' RV - they just don't go very far. It is already wasteful to use disposable pads, and I dislike that it takes more pads that I would have expected for that amount of space.I am very happy with the product except for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says. Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I have used different Swiffer dusters for years. I recently moved and now have laminate flooring rather than porcelain tile and carpet. The two in one sweeper and mop come in 3 sections which assemble quickly. The Swiffer Multi Surface Floor Cleaner is perfect for sweeping and mopping by just changing the duster or mop pad. Both get into corners and under the bed easily and efficiently. Does a great job of mopping the floor with just the right amount of moisture. It’s easy and lightweight. No mess. No bucket. Done in no time. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and very useful for cleaning around the home and shipping this product arrived ahead of schedule thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My life has been changed
reviews.reviewText: I have a cat that pretty much lives in my room, complete with food and litter box being in here. My room however, is extremely small, and with a cat in there as well the floors get disgusting pretty quickly. Now I am partially to blame, I hate sweeping and mopping. Having to break my back sweeping everything up and then lugging the bulky and heavy mop upstairs, yeah not my favorite thing to do so I may or may not avoid doing it.The Swiffer literally changed my daily habit and how I feel about sweeping and mopping so much that I actually now sweep my bedroom floor everyday and mop it every couple days! It's light as a feather so I don't have to exert a ton of energy to move it around, and because its so thin and lightweight I can sweep/mop the annoying corners or under the bed that originally required me to move the furniture to get under. The mop and sweeping pads pick up a lot of the dirt better than my actual broom and mop, plus the refills are honestly very cheap so its not just a money drain to get the refills. (Stores like Walmart and Target typically carry their store brand version for cheaper too if you really can't spare 8-9 bucks)I honestly have no bad reviews for this other than the regular mop pads seem to dry out a little quicker than I would like them to, which causes me to have to press a little harder near the end of my mopping. Not really a big deal though.If you're on the fence about this and are thinking about getting an expensive and fancy mop or broom, just get this. You save your money, and keeping small spaces clean becomes a hell of a lot easier.
Good product . Easy to use . Can clean everyday spills and dust easily .
